section.title: Tracers

important.para: Spaces where introduced in log4j category name to properly render page. Please remove them when using copy/paste.

section.para: The example Application uses a single JAIN SLEE 1.1 Tracer, named SimpleSip11B2BTestSbb. The related log4j category is javax.slee.SbbNotification[service=ServiceID[name= SimpleSip11B2BTestService,vendor=org.mobicents,version=1.0], sbb=SbbID[name=SimpleSip11B2BTestSbb,vendor=org.mobicents,version=1.0]].

section.title: Alarms
section.para: The example Application does not sets JAIN SLEE Alarms.
